articles.title: DPRK-U.S. ministerial contact to be held
articles.content:
DPRK-U.S. ministerial contact to be held 
    Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- The Foreign Minister of the DPRK and the U.S. State Secretary will meet to discuss issues related to the bilateral relations on July 26, prior to the Bangkok ASEAN regional forum to be held on July 27.
